title: CARDONEX ⚡
description: There is need of a college club focused on organizing hackathons, raising awareness and guiding university student talent towards Cardano.
solution: We are aiming to build a club where we can bring university students from all over India and developing countries on board.
experience: We have developed another Cardano project (deqree.in) & are Plutus pioneers. Moderating a group of around 5k+ tech students from our college
